code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var initialState=[{id:0,pais:"Chile",moneda:"peso"},{id:1,pais:"Alemania",moneda:"jojoj"},{id:2,pais:"Colombia",moneda:"peso colombiano"}];export var paises=createSlice({name:"paises",initialState:initialState,reducers:{agregarPais:function agregarPais(state,action){state.push(action.payload);},actualizarPais:function actualizarPais(state,action){},eliminarPais:function eliminarPais(state,action){var encontrado=state.find(function(item){return item.id===action.payload;});state.splice(state.indexOf(encontrado),1);}}});var _paises$actions=paises.actions,agregarPais=_paises$actions.agregarPais,eliminarPais=_paises$actions.eliminarPais;export{agregarPais,eliminarPais};export default paises.reducer;
